author: Gary
content: Google should ask its users if we want chrome to be divested. This is extreme overreach by a government body attempting to validate themselves with make work projects!

content: Bearish: Somedays I'm Bullish, while other days im bearish...  im so confused when I forget my Alzheimers medication

content: This stock is done for. One bad year

author: Anita
content: We got a dividend coming on dec. 9th and there are buybacks in place. not sure why the selling here. I bet management is buying!  this drop is a buying opportunity. this rises from here back to 180 by next earnings two months away.

author: Carl
content: Bullish: Does it even matter to the DOJ that maybe most people prefer to use these products instead of the competition? If they dismantle this, it really only serves Microsoft. Fortunately I'm invested there but will have to add more if this gains real traction. It makes you wonder if there is some connection here...

author: Jake
content: Bearish: At 5% annual growth, it will take 12 years for an investment in Google to pay off. Given that Google has already saturated their market, I would estimate annual growth at 2%. At 2% growth it will take 14 years. Compared to MSFT, this is horrible.

content: Garbage stock like other mag 7 all trashes

author: Jake
content: Bearish: It's overvalued, but some of the others have decent multiples.

content: Meh!  It’ll just be some big fine like what doj did to meta in 2022.  Meta dropped to 90 and now it’s nearly 700.  More shares for me 🚀🚀🚀🚀

author: brando
content: sitting right on the 200 day moving average either we bounce higher or break through and drop lower fast, this won't go sideways, good risk/reward at 19 forward pe with the great earnings they just had

author: Joost
content: Bullish: Very attractive valuation for such a strong company. The risk reward is very favourable here. Especially compared to the other big tech's valuations this is the best bet. Google will outperform in 2025. PT: $250
